name: ftpgrab
description: FTPGrab is a CLI utility that monitors FTP/SFTP directories and downloads new files automatically. Designed for automation tasks and syncing workflows in combination with cron or container execution.
features: FTP Sync: Monitor FTP/SFTP directories, Automatic downloads, Cron-friendly. Automated file synchronization.
Automation: Perfect for scheduled tasks. Hands-free operation.
Container-Ready: Run in Docker. Easy deployment.
Workflow Integration: Sync remote files locally. Reliable transfers.
Incremental Sync: Download only new files. Efficient transfers.
Notifications: Alert on completion. Stay informed.
Logging: Track sync operations. Audit trail.
Multi-Server: Monitor multiple sources. Centralized sync.
